    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Lípidos</string>
            <string language="en">Lipids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lipide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lipides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lipids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lipidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λιπίδια</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se describen las características comunes a los lípidos, los ácidos grasos, los acil-glicéridos y los céridos. Además, se explican los fosfolípidos, esfingolípidos y los lípidos insaponificables.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing the common characteristics of lipids, fatty acids, acylglycerides, and waxes. There is also an explanation of phospholipids, sphingolipids and unsaponified lipids.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lípidos</string>
            <string language="en">Lipids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die geläufigen Eigenschaften der 
Lipide, der Fettsäuren, der acylglycerides und der Wachse beschreibt.
Es gibt auch eine Erklärung der Phospholipide, sphingolipids 
und unsaponified Lipide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant les caractéristiques communes 
des lipides, des acides gras, des acylglycerides, et des cires. 
Il y a également une explication des phospholipides, 
sphingolipids et unsaponified des lipides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descreve as características comuns 
dos lipids, de ácidos fatty, de acylglycerides, e de ceras. Há
também uma explanação dos phospholipids, sphingolipids e 
unsaponified lipids.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrive le caratteristiche comuni 
dei lipidi, degli acidi grassi, dei acylglycerides e delle cere. 
Ci è egualmente una spiegazione dei fosfolipidi, sphingolipids 
ed unsaponified i lipidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφει τα κοινά χαρακτηριστικά των 
λιπιδίων, των λιπαρών οξέων, acylglycerides, και των κεριών. 
Υπάρχει επίσης μια εξήγηση των φωσφολιπιδίων, 
sphingolipids και τα λιπίδια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lipide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lipides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lipids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lipidi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λιπίδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
